author: Daniel15
body: This is noted at https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md#ubuntu-1604, but not in the readme.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@Daniel15**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: If we're not actively supporting it, it shouldn't be in the readme. Debian Testing users already know they're likely able to use recent Ubuntu packages.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: If Debian community really want Powershell so vote here and join the Powershell project.

comments.author: Daniel15
comments.body:
¯\_(ツ)_/¯

> If we're not actively supporting it, it shouldn't be in the readme. 

OK, in that case I'll just close this.

title: Note that Ubuntu 16.04 package works on Debian Testing too
